message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $130. That's the best I can do. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Would you be willing to consider that?
